headline: Capital One takes the premium credit card arms race to the next level with Miami Art Week perks
summary: The company’s strategic Art Week investment reflects a new reality in the credit card market, where emotional connection drives retention.

raw.headline: Capital One takes the premium credit card arms race to the next level with Miami Art Week perks

headline: Westwood Financial Raises Additional $145 Million in Capital, Accelerating Long-Term Growth Strategy
summary: LOS ANGELES, December 08, 2025--Westwood Financial, a 55-year-old leading retail real estate investment firm based in Los Angeles, today announced it has closed on the recast and $145 million upsize to its corporate credit facility, increasing the total facility to $470 million.

headline: Buying Stability: Preferred Dividends From Large Banks; Yields +6%
summary: Banks lead preferred issuance with steady income benefits and defensive qualities that strengthen portfolios. See why our top preferred picks offer value.

headline: 2 Cash-Heavy Stocks with Competitive Advantages and 1 Facing Headwinds
summary: Companies with more cash than debt can be financially resilient, but that doesn’t mean they’re all strong investments. Some lack leverage because they struggle to grow or generate consistent profits, making them unattractive borrowers.

raw.headline: 2 Cash-Heavy Stocks with Competitive Advantages and 1 Facing Headwinds
raw.summary: Companies with more cash than debt can be financially resilient, but that doesn’t mean they’re all strong investments. Some lack leverage because they struggle to grow or generate consistent profits, making them unattractive borrowers.
